Yakima.Riverside Christian School: Riverside Christian School is a private Christian school in Yakima, Washington providing education for Pre-school through 12th Grade students. The Early Learning Center is a licensed daycare that supports enrolled students before and after school and/or 1/2 day. Riverside Christian School is a member of the Association of Christian Schools International, Washington Federation of Independent schools, and State approved ACSI Accredited and NAAS. Riverside Christian School has been serving the Yakima Valley and surrounding areas since 1973 representing over 54 area churches.
